meanings.sent1: She quickly deles the unnecessary text from the document.
meanings.sent2: Please deles the old files to make space for new ones.
meanings.sent3: The magic eraser deles mistakes like they were never there.
meanings.sent4: His swift actions deles any doubts about his abilities.

meanings.definition: A symbol used in proofreading to indicate that something should be deleted
meanings.sent1: The editor marked the error with a deles in the margin.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use a deles when proofreading your work.
meanings.sent3: The tiny deles on the paper caught the cat's attention.
meanings.sent4: The deles on the page signaled the need for revision.
meanings.sent5: The red deles stood out against the white background.
